content: the mckenzie hat crochet pattern features the beautiful texture of the herringbone single_crochet stitch the herringbone single_crochet stitch is a beautiful stitch that looks as though it has been braided the stitch is not too hard to work although it is worked slightly differently depending on if you are working it from the right side of the fabric or the wrong side but once you get the hang of it you will love the results a free written copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported website https //richtexturescrochet com/mckenzie-hat-crochet-pattern/ a free video tutorial for this hat crochet pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtetxurescrochet/ skill level intermediate gauge 16 sts x 16 row of half_double_crochet in 3rd loop = 4 inches finished size 9 x 9 5 inches laid flat 20-22 inch circumference yarn heartland by lion brand yarn 100% acrylic 5 oz/142g 251 yds/230 m 1 ball yosemite hook size h/8 5 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge notions yarn needle
